      • addDefaultHelpParameter

        public Parameter addDefaultHelpParameter(java.io.PrintStream out,
                                         java.lang.String description,
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String prefix)
        Add a default help parameter to print command info in a PrintStream
        Parameters:
        out - print buffer (like System.out)
        description - a help description, shown on top
        name - parameter name (tipically help or h or ?)
        prefix - param prefix
        Returns:
        the help default parameter added to parser
